languages.text: "Друкари истребили сотни тысяч собратьев ради своего мимолетного удовольствия. И поработили провидцев для своих проклятых опытов. Вот как, мон-кай, я оказался подвешенным в этой клетке".

traits.locale_text: "Друкари истребили сотни тысяч собратьев ради своего мимолетного удовольствия. И пработили провидцев для своих проклятых опытов. Вот как, мон-кай, я оказался подвешенным в этой клетке".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."
languages.original_text: "Друкари истребили сотни тысяч собратьев ради своего мимолетного удовольствия. И поработили провидцев для своих проклятых опытов. Вот как, мон-кай, я оказался подвешенным в этой клетке".

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their kin for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their kin for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Los Drukhari masacraron a cientos de miles por una efímera sensación de placer, y subyugaron a nuestros videntes para sus malditos experimentos. Y así, mon-keigh, fue como acabé colgado en esta jaula».
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."

traits.locale_text: «Los Drukhari masacraron a cientos de miles por una efímera sensación de placer, y subyugaron a nuestros videntes para sus malditos experimentos. Y así, mon-keigh, fue como acabé colgado en esta jaula».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「デュカーリはひと時の快楽のために 幾万もの同族を虐殺した。そして呪われた実験のために先見司たちを奴隷にしたのだ。モン＝ケイよ、こうして私がこの檻に吊されることになったんだ」
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリはひと時の快楽のために 幾万もの同族を虐殺した。そして呪われた実験のために先見司たちを奴隷にしたのだ。モン＝ケイよ、こうして私がこの檻に吊されることになったんだ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “那些黑暗灵族为了一时的欢愉，屠杀了我们成百上千的族人，还奴役了我们的先知，用来进行他们的邪恶实验。正因如此，我才会被吊在这个笼子里。”
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."

traits.locale_text: “那些黑暗灵族为了一时的欢愉，屠杀了我们成百上千的族人，还奴役了我们的先知，用来进行他们的邪恶实验。正因如此，我才会被吊在这个笼子里。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Les Drukharis ont massacré des centaines de milliers de leurs congénères pour leur simple amusement. Puis, ils ont asservi les Grands Prophètes pour leurs maudites expériences. Et voilà, mon-keigh, comment j'ai fini dans cette cage. »
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."

traits.locale_text: « Les Drukharis ont massacré des centaines de milliers de leurs congénères pour leur simple amusement. Puis, ils ont asservi les Grands Prophètes pour leurs maudites expériences. Et voilà, mon-keigh, comment j'ai fini dans cette cage. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Die Drukhari opferten Hunderttausende von ihrer Art nur zu ihrem eigenen flüchtigen Vergnügen. Und die versklavten unsere Runenpropheten für ihre verfluchten Experimente. Und so, Chem-Pan-Sey, landete ich in diesem Käfig."
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."

traits.locale_text: Die Drukhari opferten Hunderttausende von ihrer Art nur zu ihrem eigenen flüchtigen Vergnügen. Und die versklavten unsere Runenpropheten für ihre verfluchten Experimente. Und so, Chem-Pan-Sey, landete ich in diesem Käfig."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Drukhariler, kendi türünden yüz binlercesini sırf bir anlık keyif uğruna katletti, uğursuz deneyleri için Ötesezenlerimizi zincire vurdu. Ben de kendimi bu kafeste sallanırken buldum mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari massacred hundreds of thousands of their own kind for fleeting pleasure's sake. And enslaved the Farseers for their accursed experiments. And that, mon-keigh, was how I ended up hanging in this cage."

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari, kendi türünden yüz binlercesini sırf bir anlık keyif adına katletti ve uğursuz deneyleri için Ötesezenlerimizi zincire vurdu. İşte böyle kendimi bu kafeste sallanırken buldum mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
